Title: Bunny, Skull, Bunny, Skull
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Carly Mensch, Jordan Harrison (story editor), Piper Kerman (based on the book by)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: The movie night selection becomes controversial. Aleida makes an adjustment. Piper worries the prison punishments are getting too medieval.
